verses.verse: You see, certainly concerning the serving, the one for the sacred people, to me it is much more than I need to do, the "to be writing to you" thing;
for I have seen your eagerness that I bragged about on your behalf to Macedonians, "Achaia has been prepared since last year." And the passion from you provoked the majority of them.
But I sent the brothers so that our bragging, the bragging on your behalf, might not be emptied in this detail, so that just as I was saying, you might be people that have been prepared.
What if somehow, when Macedonians came together with me, they actually found you unprepared? We (so that I may not say you) would be ashamed in this substance of our bragging.

So I regarded it essential to encourage the brothers so that they might go on ahead to you and develop beforehand your previously proclaimed conferring of prosperity for this to be ready in this way, as a conferring of prosperity from you and not even as a desire for more.
Remember this: the one who seeds lightly, lightly will he also harvest, and the one who seeds based on a conferring of prosperity, based on a conferring of prosperity will he also harvest.
Each person must give just as he choses in his heart beforehand, not from sadness or from an obligation. You see, God loves a thrilled giver.
God is able to overflow every bit of generosity to you so that in everything always having every bit of contentment, you may overflow in every good action.
This is just as it has been written, (in Psalm 112:9) "He scattered it. He gave to the underprivileged. His right way stays for the span of time."
The One who further supplies seed to the one who seeds and bread for dining will supply and increase your batch of seeds. And He will grow the produce of your right way
in everything as you become rich for every bit of dedication, something that works on and completes thankfulness to God through us
because the serving of this ministry is not only furnishing the deficiencies of the sacred people, but also overflowing through many thanks to God

through the experience of this serving, making God magnificent based on the compliance of your acknowledgment to the good news of the Anointed King, based on dedication of the sharing relationship for them and for all,
and based on their plea over you, yearning for you, because of the superior generosity of God on you.
Generosity be to God based on His indescribable free handout.
